system.effect: Temporary Upgrade that takes one hour to apply to armour, and empties one container per hit location treated. As part of application make -20 Scholastic Lore (Occult) or Forbidden Lore (Imperial Creed) test for each location. Failiure means ritual must be retried. For each location treated, wearer grants +5 to tests to resist Fear caused by Daemonic Characters and Resist Psychic Powers. Effects last one month or less if excessive wear and tear).
